name: Arcane
info: You can buy Magical skills for half their original XP cost and can use the MIND attribute on Magical skills

name: Barbaric
info: You can buy Strong skills for half their original XP cost and use the BODY attribute on Strong skills.

name: Cheeky
info: You can buy Irreverent skills for half their original XP cost and use the MIND attribute on Irreverent skills.

name: Cunning
info: You can buy Clever skills for half their original XP cost and use the MIND attribute on Clever skills.

name: Disciplined
info: You can buy Martial skills for half their original XP cost and use the BODY attribute on MARTIAL skills.

name: Earthy
info: You can buy Natural skills for half their original XP cost and use the MAGIC attribute on natural skills.

name: Divine
info: You can buy Grace skills for half their original XP cost and use the MAGIC attribute on graceful skills.

name: Swift
info: You can buy Dextrous skills for half their original XP cost and use the BODY attribute on dextrous skills.
